channel.title: HP Bars [PI] [HELP]

item.title: HP Bars [PI] [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

Hey, I need help on why my HP bars are the old oneâ€™s when the directory for HP bars is set to the new one and I do not have the old one in my cache.

The code is below for my HP Bars

if(((Entity) (obj)).loopCycleStatus > loopCycle) { try{ npcScreenPos(((Entity) (obj)), ((Entity) (obj)).height + 15); if(spriteDrawX > -1) { int i1 = (((Entity) (obj)).currentHealth * 30) / ((Entity) (obj)).maxHealth; if(i1 > 30) i1 = 30; int HpPercent = (((Entity) (obj)).currentHealth * 56) / ((Entity) (obj)).maxHealth; if (HpPercent > 56) HpPercent = 56; DrawingArea.drawPixels(5, spriteDrawY - 3, spriteDrawX - 15, 65280, i1); DrawingArea.drawPixels(5, spriteDrawY - 3, (spriteDrawX - 15) + i1, 0xff0000, 30 - i1); //HPBarEmpty.drawSprite(spriteDrawX - 28, spriteDrawY - 5); // HPBarFull = new Sprite("./Sprites/HITPOINTS_0", HpPercent, 7); //HPBarFull.drawSprite(spriteDrawX - 28, spriteDrawY - 5); }
